scripts.docker:dev: docker-compose up && echo 'Server started at http://localhost:8080'
scripts.docker:restart: docker-compose restart && echo 'Server restarted at http://localhost:8080'
scripts.docker:stop: docker-compose down && echo 'Docker images and server were stoped'
scripts.docker:build: docker-compose up --build && echo 'Docker image rebuilt and server started at http://localhost:8080'
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && echo 'The Docker system has been cleaned'
